short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforms long reddit post links into short redd.it links quickly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you use reddit regularly and share posts among the community, this extension is for you!

Instantly shorten long boring links and be able to share them easily.




NOTE:
This extension works only for reddit post links (i.e. links that contain a sub string "comments/id").
